title: Dining room

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Dining room in a player-owned house is a place where a servant can serve food to the player and guests.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Dining room
For a list of all items and upgrades within the Construction skill, see Construction/Level up table.
Dining room
Released31 May 2006 (Update)
Icon
Construction level10
Cost5,000
Door layout
Dining room

The Dining room in a player-owned house is a place where a servant can serve food to the player and guests.

Building a Dining room requires level 10 Construction and 5,000.

There are 6 hotspots available:

  • Bell pull space
  • Curtain space
  • Decoration space
  • Fireplace space
  • Seating space
  • Table space

Contents

  • 1 Bell-pull
  • 2 Curtains
  • 3 Decoration
  • 4 Fireplace
  • 5 Seating
  • 6 Table

Bell-pull[edit | edit source]

Ringing a bell-pull in your dining room instantly summons your servant, making it very useful.

Level Bell pull Materials Experience Cost
26 Rope bell-pull Oak plank
Rope 		64 528
37 Bell-pull Teak plank
Bolt of cloth x2 		120 2,776
60 Posh bell-pull Teak plank
Bolt of cloth x2
Gold leaf 		420 138,287

Curtains[edit | edit source]

Level Curtains Materials Experience Cost
2 Torn curtains Plank x3
Bolt of cloth x3
Nails x3 		132 3,777 - 6,237[c 1]
18 Curtains Oak plank x3
Bolt of cloth x3 		225 4,287
40 Opulent curtains Teak plank x3
Bolt of cloth x3 		315 5,418
  1. ^ Cost changes depending on the type of nails used.

Decoration[edit | edit source]

You must speak to Sir Renitee in White Knights' Castle to obtain a family crest before you can build a Decoration.

Level Decoration Materials Experience Cost
16 Oak wall decoration Oak plank x2 120 918
36 Teak wall decoration Teak plank x2 180 1,672
56 Gilded decoration Mahogany plank x3
Gold leaf x2 		1,020 277,286

Fireplace[edit | edit source]

You can only use regular logs to light the fireplace, giving some Firemaking experience.

Level Fireplace Materials Experience Cost
3 Clay fireplace Soft clay x3 30 492
33 Stone fireplace Limestone brick x2 40 412
63 Marble fireplace Marble block 500 331,613

Seating[edit | edit source]

Benches are used to sit on. They have little practical use but add to the 'dining room' concept.

Level Seating Materials Experience Cost
10 Wooden bench Plank x4
Nails x4 		115 1,156 - 4,436[c 1]
22 Oak bench Oak plank x4 240 1,836
31 Carved oak bench Oak plank x4 240 1,836
38 Teak dining bench Teak plank x4 360 3,344
44 Carved teak bench Teak plank x4 360 3,344
52 Mahogany bench Mahogany plank x4 560 8,352
61 Gilded bench Mahogany plank x4
Gold leaf x4 		1,760 550,396
  1. ^ Cost changes depending on the type of nails used.

Nails x4 		115 1,156 - 4,436[c 1]

45 Carved teak table Teak plank x6
Bolt of cloth x4 		600 8,896
52 Mahogany table Mahogany plank x6 840 12,528
72 Opulent table Mahogany plank x6
Bolt of cloth x4
Gold leaf x4
Marble block x2 		3,100 1,221,678
  1. ^ Cost changes depending on the type of nails used.
